channel.title: Censored Version of Black Mesa?
channel.description: Hi, My problem is that the bodys just disappear when they die. Do i have the censored version of black mesa? I downloded the torrent version or is it because im from germany? Please help me its annoying and sry for my bad english.

item.title: Censored Version of Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: OrangeRange
item.description:
Sry that i reply so late but its working now. Thanks for the help. I hope USK here in germany dies. -.-

item.title: Censored Version of Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: dahaka
item.description:
Hello,
how do the bodies disappear? Do they fade away? If so its because of the german censored version. I think there is a fix for that (right in the first post): https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12634
